resources.string: Collection process completed with error. Please, try again to rerun collection
An erorr occured while upload data. Please, verify your network settings and try to perform this action again

In compliance with the Personal Data Protection Act (“PDPA”), CredoLab Pte. Ltd. (“Company”) seeks your consent to collect and use your personal data (i.e. Name, contact numbers, information and relevant data, mailing and email addresses) for the purpose of obtaining a data driven credit score. The Company respects your privacy and assures that your personal data will be kept securely according to PDPA. I hereby give my acknowledgement and consent to the Company to use my personal data for the aforesaid Purposes and Services. I agree that my consent will remain in place until my withdrawal by officially notifying the Company in writing.
Request Code is invalid, contact lender
Request Code is presented in SMS from Bank. If you didnt receive SMS then ask lender to provide Request Code value
Service is unavailable. Make sure that your network connection is active and try again
